sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Set the default values of columns to point to the corresponding stage columns</description>
        <name>SAM - Set default value of columns</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var tableColumns = {
		samp_sw_publisher: {
			name: 'javascript:current.stage_name;',
			description: 'javascript:current.stage_description;',
		},
		samp_sw_product: {
			prod_name: 'javascript:current.stage_prod_name;',
			publisher: 'javascript:current.stage_publisher;',
			product_type: 'javascript:current.stage_product_type;',
			function_type: 'javascript:current.stage_function_type;',
			subscription_software:
				'javascript:current.stage_subscription_software;',
			ignore_installs: 'javascript:current.stage_ignore_installs;',
			description: 'javascript:current.stage_description;',
			main_category: 'javascript:current.stage_main_category;',
			categories: 'javascript:current.stage_categories.toString();',
		},
		samp_sw_entitlement_definition: {
			software_title: 'javascript:current.stage_software_title;',
		},
		samp_sw_product_definition: {
			product_type: 'javascript: (SampConstants.SUPPORTED_PRODUCT_TYPES.indexOf('
				+ "current.getValue('stage_product_type')) !== -1) ? current.stage_product_type : '';",
		},
	};
	if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('sn_sam_saas')) {
		tableColumns.samp_sw_subscription_product_definition = {
			entitlement_definition: 'javascript:current.stage_entitlement_definition;',
		};
	}
	if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.file_signature_normalization')) {
		tableColumns.samp_file_set = {
			publisher: 'javascript:current.stage_publisher;',
			product: 'javascript:current.stage_product;',
		};
	}
	function updateDefaultValue(table, columnName, defaultValue) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
		gr.addQuery('name', table);
		gr.addQuery('element', columnName);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.next()) {
			gr.setWorkflow(false);
			gr.setValue('default_value', defaultValue);
			gr.update();
		}
	}
	var col;
	Object.keys(tableColumns).forEach(function(table) {
		col = tableColumns[table];
		Object.keys(col).forEach(function(name) {
			updateDefaultValue(table, name, col[name]);
		});
	});
}());]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-19 11:58:34</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d3141eeedb9bbb00976aaab35b9619e7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SAM - Set default value of columns</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d3141eeedb9bbb00976aaab35b9619e7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-02-11 22:14:51</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: SAM - Set default value of columns
